text:
REZA ASLAN: So now you've been
excommunicated from the church.

And, of course, the church
claims to have a copyright.

TAMI LEMBERGER:
[laughs] Can you imagine
trying to copyright Hinduism?

REZA ASLAN: That's
what they would say.

I mean, they said that
you were in violation
of their copyright.
TAMI LEMBERGER: Yeah.

And after we left the
church, they asked
us to burn all the old books.

REZA ASLAN: And they
told us to burn them.
TAMI LEMBERGER: Burn, yeah.
But we did this research.

And then we found out that
all the technology-- including
the confidential OT levels--
it's all available.

DANI LEMBERGER:
All the materials
are available on the internet.

REZA ASLAN: So you
could actually access--

TAMI LEMBERGER: Exactly.
REZA ASLAN: --this material.

TAMI LEMBERGER: And
then I can deliver it.

DANI LEMBERGER: So we are
just breaking the monopoly.

REZA ASLAN: You feel that what
you're doing here in Haifa

is more of what LRH
originally intended.

It's-- it's the
purer version of--
of Scientology?
DANI LEMBERGER: Yeah.
TAMI LEMBERGER: Oh, definitely.
This is the true Scientology.

DANI LEMBERGER: I'm only
loyal to one person,
and that is Ron Hubbard.

Ron Hubbard is the
source of Scientology.

And I have no doubt that,
if Ron Hubbard came around,
he would hug me.

And he would say
Dani, Tami, thank you
so much for what you're doing.
